page-tokenholders-intro: Every day thousands of tokenholders participate in Livepeer, the worldâ€™s first open source, peer-to-peer video transcoding platform.
page-tokenholders-get-token: Get token, then put it to work
page-tokenholders-get-text-one: ERC-20 token available on a number of non-custodial and custodial exchanges
page-tokenholders-get-text-two: Originally distributed via a 'Merkle Mine', an algorithm for decentralized distribution of token during the genesis state
page-tokenholders-get-text-three: Inflationary according to algorithmically programmed issuance over time
page-tokenholders-stake-text-one: Earns you the right to perform or delegate work on the Livepeer network and vote on protocol proposals
page-tokenholders-stake-text-two: Routes work through the network in proportion to the amount of staked and delegated token, serving as a coordination mechanism
page-tokenholders-stake-text-three: Secures the network against a number of attacks via slashing that occurs due to protocol violation
page-tokenholders-questions-text: Discover the most frequently asked questions about Livepeer.
page-tokenholders-meta-description: Livepeer.org is a primary online resource for participants and users of the Livepeer network.
